name: Sleight Of Command
text:
Cost: 2 AP.
Choose an enemy character within range whose remaining HP is less than or equal to your devotion to the fae god. That character makes a 5d6 (high-rolling) weapon or unarmed attack against a character near it.
If that character has its own 5d6 weapon or unarmed attack, it uses that attack instead.

Increase your devotion to the fae god by 1.
